name: Fictitious Force
blurb: Installation of "Fictitious Force" outdoors at the Old Stone House & Washington Park in Park Slope, Brooklyn, in spring 2015.

name: Marin City Art & Skate Park
blurb: Keith Williams (Hood Gamez) brought in Proof Lab to help build a community Art & Skate Park in the unused Marin City tennis courts

name: Help Excavate Cosa's East Terminal Wall
blurb: Help fund the full excavation of East Terminal Wall, the exterior wall of a Roman bath complex in the Roman colony of Cosa (273 BCE)

name: A Statue of Nikola Tesla in the Silicon Valley
blurb: The statue will host a free Wi-Fi hotspot & a time capsule to be opened Jan 7, 2043... and then the statue might go to Mars.

name: BODYPAINTING DAY 2015: New York City & Amsterdam
blurb: Live nude body painting events in the public streets of NYC & Amsterdam! Promoting Freedom of Expression & Body Acceptance

name: Rainworks Invisible Spray: Create Rain-Activated Art!
blurb: Create images and messages that only appear when wet. Together we can give the world a reason to look forward to rainy days!

name: Repellent Fence
blurb: Postcommodity presents a temporary 2-mile long land art installation intersecting the US/Mexico border, Oct. 9-12, 2015.

name: PORTALS by Shared_Studios
blurb: Portals are gold shipping containers with immersive audio-visual tech inside. Enter one and come face-to-face with someone in another.

name: Black Rock Observatory 2015
blurb: A mobile astronomical observatory with a giant, hand-made telescope and meteorite samples for Burning Man 2015 and beyond.

name: HAVE YOU SEEN ME? A MEMORIAL TO SLAVERY
blurb: Have You Seen Me? transforms the 1980s “kid on the milk carton” advocacy campaign into a memorial for those lost during the Slave Trade

name: Center for Lost Arts – a document
blurb: A month-long pop-up workshop & design studio intersecting 40 creatives from various disciplines in one space, documenting everything

name: Molly Crabapple's Week in Hell
blurb: For Molly Crabapple's Week in Hell, I'm locking myself in a room for five days and covering the walls in art

name: Next Stop: Democracy! - A New Look for Election Day
blurb: Next Stop: Democracy! is hiring local artists and makers to inspire celebration and participation on Election Day.

name: The Dock Tattoo Project
blurb: Connected by Sea: Boston’s 1000-ft Tattoo! Staining tattoo designs @HarborArts pier showing the cultures we've been connected to by sea

name: Visualize Pi Perspective
blurb: Students from The Green School in East Williamsburg Brooklyn combine mathematics and art to VISUALIZE Pi as a mural in their community!

name: Black Rock Observatory
blurb: We're building a real astronomical observatory for Burning Man 2014 and beyond, complete with giant telescope and science exhibits.

name: Billion Oyster Pavilion
blurb: An Installation on Governor’s Island for Summer 2015, that will become a Permanent Contribution to NY Harbor as Oyster Reef.

name: Shell Game: An Art Show About the Financial Meltdown
blurb: For Shell Game, I'll create 9 giant paintings about the world financial meltdown, then have a gallery show in a faux gambling parlor

name: @Large: Ai Weiwei on Alcatraz
blurb: Be a part of an unprecedented exhibition by artist and activist Ai Weiwei on Alcatraz Island.

name: BIG INK: Large Woodcut Revolution
blurb: Help fund the world's first giant traveling press and bring printmaking to local communities, art festivals, museums, and schools.

name: Electric Dandelions Goes To Burning Man, Then Reno
blurb: We received placement in a Reno Art Park to be displayed for 3-6 months starting in October. Help us to finish the project.

name: Breaking Rag: N.C. Military, Veteran & Community Art
blurb: This veteran & community art project begins with making handmade paper from military uniforms and creates a space for  understanding.

name: Pier / Platforms in the Southwest
blurb: Using found materials to build piers that function as platforms for reflection and interaction in unconventional locations

name: Court 13 Arts Headquarters
blurb: Help Court 13 Arts create a home for community-based art, filmmaking, and creativity in New Orleans and beyond!

name: ARTUNITE SEAHORSE
blurb: 10 international artists create artwork directly on the walls of Kongelunden Asylm Center.

name: The Wall of Answered Prayer - UK National Landmark
blurb: Former Leicester City Chaplains' bid to build a national landmark about Jesus: a million bricks - a million answered prayers.

name: Common Knowledge
blurb: Our goal is to bring what people have known about plants and their stories back into the realm of Common Knowledge.

name: La Victrola: Music, Art & Cabaret
blurb: A 35-foot tall sculpture and cabaret stage. A tribute to the birth of recorded music, headed to Burning Man and beyond.

name: ADOBE BOOKS BACKROOM GALLERY CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT CAMPAIGN
blurb: We are trying to raise $20,200 to fund Mission-based grassroots arts programming and support for artists for the upcoming year.

name: The 50 Card Project
blurb: A different limited-edition letterpress card printed every week from Inauguration Day to the end of 2017.

name: The Butterfly Effect
blurb: We will create a public Pollinator Habitat and Education Garden and  together release 100's of Monarch Butterflies into the world.

name: Biodiversity Mural for The CT Audubon Center at Fairfield
blurb: A mural celebrating Connecticut’s wildlife.

name: Tear Down This Wall!
blurb:
Be a part of it!
We are initiating a huge happening.

name: We the People: public art for the inauguration and beyond
blurb: Join artists Shepard Fairey, Jessica Sabogal, and Ernesto Yerena as we disrupt the rising tide of hate and fear in America.

name: Sites Unseen | Public Art in San Francisco's Alleys
blurb: Sites Unseen is a public art initiative in downtown San Francisco that programs alleyways with installations and participatory events.

name: Ai Weiwei: Good Fences Make Good Neighbors
blurb: Public Art Fund & Ai Weiwei collaborate on a powerful new exhibition addressing human rights issues at 300 + outdoor sites in NYC

name: NOTW Lights Annual Christmas Light Show
blurb: The "Not Of This World" Annual Christmas light show is a wonder to behold and tells the story of each song in animated light sequences.

name: "Collectively we support your Autonomy" Neon Sign
blurb: A 20-foot long neon sign reading "collectively we support your autonomy" installed on the roof of the Soap Factory art center.

name: Jersey Fresh Jam 2017 Needs You!
blurb: Jersey Fresh Jam 2017, Amazing Hip Hop event Since 2005 needs  help to supply paint and sound equipment for this years event!

name: Street Art Dance Studio Mural
blurb: An inspiring, hand painted, Street Art Mural for the back lot of Poetry in Motion Dance Studio in Hutchinson, KS by artist Brady Scott.

name: Parkside Studio at Andy
blurb: Andy is the name of a developing performing arts space in NorthWest Detroit.  Support our next step:  Parkside Studio.

name: An Australian Street Artist in America
blurb: I'm coming to America to stick up posters so I can learn what it takes to be an American Political Entrepreneur!

name: Limited Edition Enamel Shroud Badges to Fund WW1 Art Project
blurb: Buy an individually numbered collectible badge to help fund the Shrouds of the Somme, an epic art installation in London this November

name: This Place Will Be Water
blurb: Making climate change visible in public spaces with design, data and stickers

name: Women to the Front! Support the Seattle Literary Scene.
blurb: Creating spaces and platforms around Seattle with a focus on literary and women-centered events.

name: Broken Wings at ArtPrize Ten!
blurb: Our healing art involves you--because you matter!

name: PAINT STROKES OF HOPE, A FEW HOURS LEFT!
blurb: From now on, five names of donors who contribute $250 and up will be drawn and written on the murals. Check out the many new rewards!!

name: The First Picture of You, 1990
blurb: A showcase of Fil Am Artists & Writers at The Philippine Center in New York City

name: Save the grave of Georges Méliès, the cinema pioneer
blurb: We did it for step 1: the restoration of the grave. Let's do step 2: 12 years of maintenance. The new goal is now 43 000€. Let's do it!

name: Asha's Place @ Kiosk.6
blurb: A series of pop-up art events in June 2019, at a kiosk in Weimar Germany, where exchange is facilitated by handmade & found objects.

name: COLOURWORXX: a new magazine about colour & urban space
blurb: Explore how colour can be used to transform spaces and cities around the world, enrich environments and support wellbeing.

name: YOU ARE BEAUTIFUL!
blurb: Public Art adjacent to the iconic High Line park in New York City, created to celebrate the intrinsic beauty inside all of us.

name: EMPYREAN 2020 Burning Man Temple
blurb: Empyrean is your Burning Man Temple of 2020. Please support and share so we can build this temple for you and everyone who needs it!

name: Der Kunstbus
blurb: Mobiles Atelier

name: Make 100: Street art pieces for everyone to enjoy.
blurb: Street art created by yon.  100 unique street art pieces painted in 2020!

name: The Story Wagon: a touring outdoor arts space
blurb: space for everyone's stories

name: ENOUGH of Trump
blurb: We’re working to get Trump out of office by placing artist-designed billboards in swing states.

name: Empyrean Temple, 2022 Burning Man Temple
blurb: Empyrean is your Burning Man Temple in 2022. Please support and share so we can build this temple for you and everyone who needs it!

name: LANDBACK.Art
blurb: We're placing 20 billboards across North America to uplift Indigenous voices and broaden support for the LANDBACK Movement.

name: Lakefront Anonymous: Chicago’s Unknown Outdoor Art Gallery
blurb: A book documenting one of the world’s great art treasures, miles of carvings hidden in plain sight along Chicago’s Lake Michigan shore

name: The Tree of Life : A Project by the Space Song Foundation
blurb: A public art/science project composed of a spacecraft and living trees singing a duet together for 200 years.

name: Wonder Hunt
blurb: It's a book. It's a game. It's a real-world treasure hunt!

name: The Rural Art Show: Art and community in rural Colorado.
blurb: We aim to showcase the importance of relationships and how individual strengths are integral to the success of the greater community.

name: The Skeleton Crawl : a creepy fine art exhibition
blurb: Help keep this arts organization alive & online! Not your typical art show. It's scary fun.

name: Designer Rugs Series 01
blurb: Various Underground Artists on High Quality Custom Art Rugs!

name: Jersey Collective Sticker Club
blurb: A pop-up art project featuring local artist-designed stickers in a traveling vending machine

name: To The North Pole And Back
blurb: Laser Plane Photography in the Arctic: Exploring People's Lingering Energies through Ioleography
